about_the_game:
Endlessly Gather Resources with Your Friends !

Idle Together is a resource management and accumulation game where you can collaborate with other players to optimize your progress. Accessible to everyone, it combines the fun of idle games with unique cooperative mechanics.

Build the Village of Your Dreams

Combine villager management with building construction to help them improve and work more efficiently. Optimize the placement of buildings to reduce travel time, or simply create the most beautiful village possible in unique, procedurally generated worlds.

Villagers with Human-Like Behavior

They're lazy and not too bright… at least at first. You'll need to keep an eye on them : some will wander to the other side of the world just to gather a few berries, while others will hide in a bush just to sneak in a quick nap.

More, More, Always More

Keep accumulating more and more resources automatically or by clicking !
These resources are precious—they'll allow you to level up, over and over again…

The Magical Power of Constellations

Your villagers believe in the power of the stars, and when you believe… it becomes reality.
Build stunning constellations based on your strategy to enhance your power and control them all.

All set in a vibrant pixel art world, accompanied by relaxing music, creating a soothing atmosphere after a long day. A game designed for the whole family, perfect for a fun and relaxing time with your loved ones.

Join the adventure and discover a world where strategy, cooperation, and resource management come together for a unique and endless experience !

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
